mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM `success_killed` as sk INNER JOIN `seckill` as s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
